snippet: An autopsy determined Myls Dobson, 4, died of “child abuse syndrome, including dehydration.”
abstract: New York City medical examiner's office rules death of 4-year-old boy Myls Dobson as homicide, paving way for murder charges to be filed in the case; prosecutors say boy was tortured and starved to death by family friend Kryzie King.
lead_paragraph: An autopsy determined Myls Dobson, 4, died of “child abuse syndrome, including dehydration.”

headline.main: Officials Rule Boy’s Death as Homicide
headline.print_headline: Officials Rule Boy’s Death as Homicide
